mapper.select: select id, title, parent_id, type, code, route_url, component_path, route_redirect, icon, sort, hidden, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from sys_menu where status = true and type in (1, 2) and deleted = 0 order by sort

select sm.id, sm.title, sm.parent_id, sm.type, sm.code, sm.route_url, sm.component_path, sm.route_redirect, sm.icon, sm.sort, sm.hidden, sm.status, sm.create_id, sm.create_time, sm.update_id, sm.update_time from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id = srm.menu_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} where (sm.type = 1 or sm.type = 2) and sur.user_id = #{userId}
select sm.id, sm.title, sm.parent_id, sm.type, sm.status, sm.sort, sm.route_url, sm.component_path, sm.hidden, sm.update_time from sys_menu sm where sm.deleted = 0 and sm.parent_id = #{parentId}
select sm.id, sm.title, sm.parent_id, sm.type, sm.status, sm.sort, sm.route_url, sm.component_path, sm.hidden, sm.update_time from sys_menu sm where sm.deleted = 0 order by sort

select sm.id, sm.title, sm.parent_id, sm.type, sm.status, sm.sort, sm.route_url, sm.component_path, sm.hidden, sm.update_time from sys_role_menu srm left join sys_menu sm on sm.id = srm.menu_id where sm.deleted = 0 and srm.role_id = #{roleId}
